Text: So much for the missing pages. =P Thanks GIANNIS511.

a marvel person lied? nooooooooo way Ahlat.  ;-)

it's interesting that the lower-quality leaked scan included the ad for angela's upcoming appearance in guardians of the galaxy, but this digital webrip doesn't... i'm sure there's no problem, but that's odd.

I wish they'd quit letting Bendis be the writer on these events, he's great at setting up the stories but incapable of high note conclusions. At least this one leads into something, so there's that. Really looking forward to Infinity as Hickman is the writer on that project and he's not anti-climatic with his storytelling.
